title: NEW CLIENT SUCKS!!
body: after every game I have to re log in randomly I cant click confirm when I try to play. in game I try to click the mini map and randomly it will just ping and not move the map. at the same time I cant talk in chat. this all started happening in the new client

replies.body: I was about to post about this. League goes into windowed mode and wont let me move the map. Now I cannot reconnect and when i do problem presists, cant move down with mouse just up left right. I played one game prior to my last and it went fine then randomly this issue happened.

It definitely sounds like there's a lot going on here. Let's focus on the first issue you mentioned, which seems to be related to a poor connection to our servers. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) offers a list of steps that should improve your connection and ensure your settings are compatible with League.

Please let me know what you observe as a result of those steps.
